Package org.udem.unishop.repositories

Class ProductRepository

java.lang.Object
org.udem.unishop.repositories.ProductRepository
public class ProductRepository extends Object
The ProductRepository class is responsible for managing and persisting products.

      Returns:

      Saves a product to the repository and writes the updated data to the JSON file.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully saved, false otherwise.

      Returns:
